summary:
This MOD will add a futanari penis to female body!
CBBE V3 BodySlide V0.9.5 supported.
descriptionHtml:
[b]This MOD will add a futanari penis to female body!
The base body is using the CBBEv3.[/b]

BodySlide V0.9.5 is supported.
You can change the body size and P size.
And you can select a few variations and outfit.

[b]This is replace the body simple.
If you want the NewFutaRaces, Please use Futanarium.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10791]Futanarium[/url][/b]

[heading]---Install(simple)------------------------------------------------------------------------[/heading]
Use Nexus Mod Manager.
Download and install as you would any other NMM mod.

Don\'t need CBBEv3 main files.(ACBBE is include it)

[b]And, Please read skyrim/data/ACBBE_Readme_en.txt or ACBBE_Readme_jp.txt[/b]


[heading]---When Using BodySlide-------------------------------------------------------------------[/heading]
-Install-
(1) First, Do the -Install(simple)- section.
(2) NMM install Calientes BodySlide v0-9-5* in CBBEv3 page. (OPTIONAL FILES section)

-How to use-
(1) Exec BodySlide.exe
(2) Select Outfit/Body:

ACBBE                : Futa-Nude
ACBBE-Laced          : Futa-Nude(with lace accessory)
ACBBE-ArchMage       : Futa-ArchMageRobe
ACBBE-ArchMage-Laced : Futa-ArchMageRobe(with lace accessory)

ACBBE_BBP-Lace       : Futa-Nude(with lace accessory)
* Require Breast and Butt physics mod.

(3) Select Preset or Customize slider.
(4) Click -Create Bodies- button, Probably it\'s applied in game.


* Dosen\'t work in V0.9, you must use V0.9.5.


[heading]---Changelog------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/heading]
V3.2  2012.02.11
Modified: penis mesh and texture
Add: lace accessory
Support: BodySlide v0.9.5
Bug Fix: Fixed feet meshes
Bug Fix: Fixed penis weight

V3.1  2012.01.28
Bug Fix: Fixed femalebody_1_msn.dds

V3.0  2012.01.28
Support: CBBEv3
Support: BodySlide v0.9

V2.5  2012.01.21
First release.
